page.title: 19*** PLAYING IN HASWELL ***
page.content: {SUMMER.}There are lots of fields in Haswell.In summer I go for walks by way of High Haswell through cow fields and farms to Elemore Wood.In Summer I go to Hetton Baths.I play tennis, cricket and rounders.During the Summer holiday my family goes to Scarborough. In the school yard we play Tallyo, Stick in the Mud and Bulldog. There are lots of wild flowers. Some boys bird nest and get into trouble. { {************************************** { {WINTER.}In winter we play snowballs. We make snowmen. I play on my sledge and make slides. I dress in thick woolly jumper,boots,trousers,hat, gloves and two pairs of socks. Indoors I play Monopoly, Cluedo, and table tennis and I knit and read. After Christmas I play with my new toys.
